allow: Bash(# Check if AtomicParsley or kid3-cli is available for embedding artwork which AtomicParsley kid3-cli eyeD3 || echo ""No tagging tools found"" # Try using ffmpeg to embed artwork with ID3v2 SRC=""/Volumes/music/DSD/Chasing The Dragon - Audiophile Recordings/TRIBUTE TO ELLA FITZGERALD BY CLARE TEAL AND THE SYD LAWRENCE ORCHESTRA 24 192"" DST=""/Volumes/music/AIFF/Chasing The Dragon - Audiophile Recordings/TRIBUTE TO ELLA FITZGERALD BY CLARE TEAL AND THE SYD LAWRENCE ORCHESTRA 24 192"" COVER=""$SRC/cover.jpg"" # Test on one file with embedded artwork ffmpeg -y -hide_banner -loglevel error \\ -i ""$SRC/01 I''ve Got You Under My Skin.wav"" \\ -i ""$COVER"" \\ -map 0:a -map 1:0 \\ -map_metadata 0 \\ -c:a pcm_s32be \\ -c:v copy \\ -id3v2_version 3 \\ -metadata:s:v title=""Album cover"" \\ -metadata:s:v comment=""Cover \(front\)"" \\ ""/tmp/test_with_cover.aiff"" </dev/null 2>&1 echo ""Checking streams..."" ffprobe ""/tmp/test_with_cover.aiff"" 2>&1)
Bash(# Quick check if kid3 is available via brew brew search kid3)
